attributes.action: Give full time househusbands and fathers the same divorce rights as housewife's and mothers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am a full time house husband and father to my career wife, and two young children, I want equal rights to that of a housewife and mother in the event of a divorce, to protect my children's future and security along with my own after supporting my wife's career. Times are changing for men and women. Equal rights for women in the work place demands equal rights for men in the homeplace!
